body.name: FUIOBYVV King Bed Frame, 14 Inch Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bed Frame King Size Support Up to 3500 lbs, No Box Spring Needed/No Shaking/Steel Slat Support/Noise Free/Easy Assembly
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 49 mins
features: 【Heavy Duty Bed Frame】The king bed frame is made of alloy steel, which is solid and durable. The middle leg of the bed frame adds a new recessed structural design that effectively reduces sway and noise, supports up to 3500 pounds, and is virtually silent when turned over.
【No Box Spring Needed】Strong steel slats support and extend the life of your latex, memory foam, or innerspring mattress without needing a box spring.
【Easy Assembly】The metal bed frame king is designed with an integrated structure, easy to install, and clear instructions. All assembly tools and instructions are packed with the bed frame.
【Reserved Holes for Headboard】2 holes are reserved for the legs of the entire bed frame to connect to the headboard to create your personalized and exclusive style.

【Under-bed Storage and 5-year Warranty】 14-inch king platform bed frame with enough space to store items under the bed, easy to organize and clean, making the room cleaner and tidier. 5-year limited manufacturer's warranty available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty - strong
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, heavy iron pieces, no squeaking, extra storage space underneath due to height of base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad i found the perfect bed. Very sturdy and easy to put together. Great price! The only downside is that I keep hitting my toes on the middle posts but there's really no way around that. Would purchase again and it's the perfect height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Definitely loving this frame. Easy to put together and it holds well, and doesn't look too shabby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big guy with bad knees so I needed a frame that gets me to chair level. I also needed a frame that would hold solid with my weight. This bedframe went together without looking at the instructions, and other than the included hex key, the only tool I used was a wirecutter to snip the zip ties holding the slats together in a bunch. It was packed very well, and only needed the included eight bolts to assemble. Assembly took me about twenty minutes total (working in a cramped space). As far as being strong, I have slept on it several nights now, and it is rock-solid--no creaking or shifting at all. I am very pleased.I cannot vouch for the 3500# weight limit, but I am over 300# and it is plenty strong. I also shift position many times per night, and have never noticed the bedframe moving or making noise.UPDATE: As I stated, I shift position several times per night, and that is where the problem started. I rolled over and heard a metallic clang. Looked under the bed, and two slats were lying on the floor with a third partly on the floor. Not a total deal-breaker, but I will be zip-tying the slats to the frame to avoid (I hope) any future issues. The frame still seems plenty strong, even with three slats no longer connected. I still recommend the frame, but be aware, if you are an active sleeper, watch for this issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and easy to put together. Price is good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Steardy and well built no squeaks. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds our fat @ss’s
reviews.reviewText: We are large and in charge ho-mos who like to eat. And with both of us and 3 dogs (small) it holds up very well. Does not squeak or move, doesn’t feel like it’s about to buckle like those folding chairs to a large person on the grass (if you know you know). Only complaint is I got my cankle on it a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it now, holds a lot of weight
reviews.reviewText: We absolutely love this frame so much I bought an extra one for our guest room and they asked for the link after I said it was from Amazon. I am also now considering buying one for our bed. My son is 6’2, 210 lbs and this was for his bed so I was hesitant to order online. We read all the reviews and this one seemed to be able to hold the weight. All 4 of us are fat and my kids and hubby are tall so we didn’t want one of those lower frames which would make it uncomfortable to sit at the edge of the bed or even get in and out of it daily. We decided to go with this one and I’m so glad we did! It feels like it was made for my son. He loves that it’s not low to the floor like the many they had in the stores but it’s also not high. He also liked that it can be “hidden.” When he put the comforter on his bed you can’t even notice the frame. All four of us have laid on that bed and not even a squeak or nothing and trust me we are heavy.Overall we liked it, good quality, great look, holds up to kids jumping into bed. We ordered another for the guest room and they loved it when they were here and already put it up as well.
Fácil armado y el material se ve de muy buena calidad
El producto es sensacional, soporta bastante y no pesa para moverlo, tiene una altura adecuada. es un excelente producto lo recomiendo bastante

reviews.reviewerName: Súper bien elColor padrísimo y buen espacio
reviews.reviewText: Fácil armado muy resistente y buen material

reviews.reviewTitle: No se ve tan resistente como en las fotos
reviews.reviewText: en las fotos se ve mas robusto y las patas cuadradas, pero en si el metal no se ve tan resistente, si se ve que puede con todo ese peso pero si puede afectar el desempeño con el tiempo. la pintura esta bien, el material se ve de calidad, pero no tanto como aparece en las fotos. no se dejen engañar.

reviews.reviewTitle: No es igual a las fotos de la publicación
reviews.reviewText: Aunque el producto se siente bien y de calidad, no es exactamente como se muestra en las fotos, la estructura es más delgada y se ve menos robusta, ya con el tiempo veremos qué tal.
